heading.start: Create Your Music like a Pro,

hero.description: From first-time creators to seasoned artists, transform your ideas into stunning songs, refine your tracks, and share it effortlessly—AI has your back from the first note to the final mix - No Tech fuss, just pure Music Magic!

features.title: Create, refine, and share music in minutes
features.description: No Experience? No Problem! AI makes music production effortless and fun.

features.title: One-Tap Music Creation
features.description: Generate a complete song or instrumental track in seconds—AI transforms ideas into full compositions effortlessly

features.title: Upload Your Own Voice & Lyrics
features.description: Customize your songs by uploading original vocals and lyrics for a truly personalized experience.

features.title: AI-Enhanced Harmonization
features.description: Let AI refine and layer your vocals with professional-grade harmonization.

features.title: Ready-to-Use Beats & Instrumentals
features.description: Access an extensive collection of beats across genres and moods to craft the perfect backing for your songs or instrumental tracks.

features.title: Create Music Effects
features.description: Explore an expansive set of sound effects and layers to enhance and innovate your compositions.

features.title: Seamless Sharing & Collaboration
features.description: Export your songs and tracks instantly and collaborate with artists worldwide.

featuresWithImages.title: Stand Out, Create Fast!
featuresWithImages.description: Our platform helps you bring your music to life—effortlessly. With AI-powered composition and seamless mixing, you can create, refine, and share your tracks with ease. Music-making has never been this simple!

features.title: Instant AI-Powered Song Creation
features.description: Compose songs instantly using AI-driven prompts and beat selection. AI transforms your ideas into polished songs and instrumental tracks in seconds.
checklist: Generate complete songs and tracks in seconds with AI-assisted composition.
Select from multiple genres and moods for unique soundscapes.

features.title: Personalize Your Sound with your custom vocals, lyrics and sound effects
features.description: Upload your voice, add lyrics, and shape your sound with several music effects. AI fine-tunes and enhances your creativity.
checklist: Customize your music with personalized vocals and lyrics.
Experiment with AI-driven sound effects and filters.
Create dynamic layers with voice harmonization.

value2.description: Songs Uploaded to Streaming Platforms per day

value3.description: Singers & Musicians Using AI for Music Creation

pricing.title: Choose a Plan that Fits Your Needs
pricing.description: Get the tools you need to create, refine, and share your music—without breaking the bank!
Access AI-powered music creation with essential tools and a selection of beats.
pricing.subtitle: For Beginners
includes: Access to a selection of beats and basic AI composition tools.
Basic harmonization and sound effect options.
Up to 5 AI-generated songs/tracks per month
Basic vocal tuning and melody generation.

pricing.description: Unlock advanced composition, harmonization, and vocal enhancement features.
pricing.subtitle: For Professionals
includes: Unlimited access to all beats, music effects, and custom uploads.
Advanced music effects and vocal enhancement options.
Multi-layer AI composition for richer sound design.
Up to 20 AI-generated songs/tracks per month.

testimonials.title: A Global Music Movement For Singers, Musicians & Creators
testimonials.description: Join thousands of musicians using AI to create magic!

col1.name: Alex M.
col1.text: TuneCrew AI isn’t just a music app—it’s my AI co-producer, helping me bring my song ideas to life effortlessly!

col1.name: Jamie Randall
col1.text: The AI-powered harmonization and effects make my songs sound professionally mixed in minutes. Game changer!

col2.name: Mia Anderson
col2.text: I love how I can upload my own vocals and let AI turn them into something incredible. It’s like having a virtual producer in my pocket.

col2.name: Chris Davis
col2.text: I never thought making music could be this easy. The AI-generated beats and vocal effects make my tracks sound polished and professional

col3.name: Jason Keppler
col3.text: As a rapper, having access to instant beats and seamless autotune helps me create and experiment faster than ever. TuneCrew AI is a must-have!

col3.name: Ray Taylor
col3.text: As a beginner, I was nervous about making music, but TuneCrew AIx made it so easy! The AI guides me through every step, helping me create songs that actually sound professional

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Got questions? We've got you covered—find all the answers here!

faq.question: What makes TuneCrew AI different from other music creation apps?
faq.answer: Unlike any other music app, TuneCrew AI is your personal AI-powered co-producer, turning raw ideas into fully produced tracks in seconds. With intuitive tools for composition, harmonization, and vocal enhancement, you don’t need production skills—just your creativity.

faq.question: Can I use my own lyrics and vocals?
faq.answer: Yes! Upload your original vocals and lyrics to customize your music. Your AI co-producer helps bring them to life.

faq.question: Is TuneCrew AI suitable for beginners?
faq.answer: Absolutely! No prior music production knowledge is needed—just your creativity, and TuneCrew AI does the rest.

faq.question: Can I share my music?
faq.answer: Yes! Export and share your tracks instantly to social media or collaborate with other artists.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Get exclusive AI music tips, new feature updates, and special offers—straight to your inbox!
